summary.span: Implements the Berkeley sockets interface.

span.span: Implements the Berkeley sockets interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类为的网络通信提供一组丰富的方法和属性。The class provides a rich set of methods and properties for network communications. 类允许你执行同步和异步数据传输使用任何通信协议列入枚举。The class allows you to perform both synchronous and asynchronous data transfer using any of the communication protocols listed in the enumeration. 类遵循的异步方法的.NET Framework 命名模式。The class follows the .NET Framework naming pattern for asynchronous methods. 例如，同步方法对应于异步和方法。For example, the synchronous method corresponds to the asynchronous and methods. 如果你的应用程序仅在执行过程中需要一个线程，使用以下方法，旨在同步操作模式。If your application only requires one thread during execution, use the following methods, which are designed for synchronous operation mode. - 如果你使用如 TCP 一个面向连接的协议，你的服务器可以侦听连接使用方法。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol such as TCP, your server can listen for connections using the method. 方法处理任何传入的连接请求，并返回，你可以使用与远程主机通信数据。The method processes any incoming connection requests and returns a that you can use to communicate data with the remote host. 使用此返回调用或方法。Use this returned to call the or method. 调用方法之前调用方法如果你想要指定本地 IP 地址和端口号。Call the method prior to calling the method if you want to specify the local IP address and port number. 如果你想要为您分配一个可用端口的基础服务提供程序，请使用端口号 0。Use a port number of zero if you want the underlying service provider to assign a free port for you. 如果你想要连接到侦听主机，调用方法。If you want to connect to a listening host, call the method. 若要进行数据通信，调用或方法。To communicate data, call the or method. - 如果使用如 UDP 无连接协议时，你不需要在所有侦听连接。If you are using a connectionless protocol such as UDP, you do not need to listen for connections at all. 调用方法，以接受任何传入的数据报。Call the method to accept any incoming datagrams. 使用方法以将数据报发送到远程主机。Use the method to send datagrams to a remote host. 若要处理通信在执行期间使用单独的线程，使用以下方法，适用于异步操作模式。To process communications using separate threads during execution, use the following methods, which are designed for asynchronous operation mode. - 如果你使用如 TCP 一个面向连接的协议，使用， ，和方法来侦听主机的连接。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol such as TCP, use the , , and methods to connect with a listening host. 使用和或和数据之间进行异步通信的方法。Use the and or and methods to communicate data asynchronously. 可以使用处理传入的连接请求和。Incoming connection requests can be processed using and . - 如果使用如 UDP 无连接协议时，你可以使用和来发送数据报，和和来接收数据报。If you are using a connectionless protocol such as UDP, you can use and to send datagrams, and and to receive datagrams. 如果执行套接字上的多个异步操作，它们不一定会完成中启动它们的顺序。If you perform multiple asynchronous operations on a socket, they do not necessarily complete in the order in which they are started. 当你完成发送和接收数据，请使用方法来禁用。When you are finished sending and receiving data, use the method to disable the . 在调用，调用方法来释放与关联的所有资源。After calling , call the method to release all resources associated with the . 类允许你配置你使用方法。The class allows you to configure your using the method. 检索使用这些设置方法。Retrieve these settings using the method. > [!NOTE] > 如果你在编写相对简单的应用程序，并且不需要最高的性能，请考虑使用， ，和。If you are writing a relatively simple application and do not require maximum performance, consider using , , and . 这些类提供的更简单且更加用户友好界面通信。These classes provide a simpler and more user-friendly interface to communications. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何类可以用于将数据发送到 HTTP 服务器并接收响应。The following code example shows how the class can be used to send data to an HTTP server and receive the response. 此示例阻塞，直到收到整个页面。This example blocks until the entire page is received. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Sockets.Socket#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.Socket/CPP/socket.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Sockets.Socket#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.Socket/CS/socket.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Sockets.Socket#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Sockets.Socket/VB/socket.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果调用多次使用相同的字节数组作为每个调用的参数的构造函数，你将创建多个托管具有相同的基础套接字的 s。If you call the constructor multiple times with the same byte array as the argument for each call, you will create multiple managed s with the same underlying socket. 强烈建议不要使用这种做法。This practice is strongly discouraged.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `socketType`参数指定的一种类和`protocolType`参数指定使用的协议。The `socketType` parameter specifies the type of the class and the `protocolType` parameter specifies the protocol used by . 两个参数不是独立的。The two parameters are not independent. 通常类型是在协议中隐式。Often the type is implicit in the protocol. 如果的组合类型和协议类型无效导致，此构造函数引发。If the combination of type and protocol type results in an invalid , this constructor throws a . > [!NOTE] > 如果此构造函数引发，使用属性来获取特定的错误代码。If this constructor throws a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks `addressFamily`参数指定的寻址方案类使用，`socketType`参数指定的一种类，与`protocolType`参数指定使用的协议。The `addressFamily` parameter specifies the addressing scheme that the class uses, the `socketType` parameter specifies the type of the class, and the `protocolType` parameter specifies the protocol used by . 三个参数不是独立的。The three parameters are not independent. 某些地址族限制哪些协议可用来与它们，并且通常类型是在协议中隐式。Some address families restrict which protocols can be used with them, and often the type is implicit in the protocol. 如果地址族的组合类型和协议类型无效导致，此构造函数引发。If the combination of address family, type, and protocol type results in an invalid , this constructor throws a . > [!NOTE] > 如果此构造函数引发，使用属性来获取特定的错误代码。If this constructor throws a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建的实例类。The following code example demonstrates how to create an instance of the class. [!code-cpp[Socket_Send_Recieve#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Send_Recieve/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Socket_Send_Recieve#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Send_Recieve/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Socket_Send_Recieve#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Send_Recieve/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以同步方式从侦听套接字，连接请求队列中提取第一个挂起的连接请求，然后创建并返回一个新。 synchronously extracts the first pending connection request from the connection request queue of the listening socket, and then creates and returns a new . 不能使用此返回接受任何额外连接从连接队列。You cannot use this returned to accept any additional connections from the connection queue. 但是，你可以调用方法的返回来标识远程主机的网络地址和端口号。However, you can call the method of the returned to identify the remote host's network address and port number. 在阻止模式下，被阻止，直至传入的连接尝试将会排队。In blocking mode, blocks until an incoming connection attempt is queued. 一旦接受连接，则原始继续队列传入连接请求之前关闭它。Once a connection is accepted, the original continues queuing incoming connection requests until you close it. 如果调用此方法使用的非阻塞，并且不启用连接请求将排队等待，引发。If you call this method using a non-blocking , and no connection requests are queued, throws a . 如果你收到，使用属性来获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 之前调用方法时，你必须首先调用方法来侦听并对传入的连接请求进行排队。Before calling the method, you must first call the method to listen for and queue incoming connection requests. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例接受一个简单连接。The following code example accepts a simple connection. [!code-cpp[Classic Socket.Accept Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Accept Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Socket.Accept Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Accept Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Socket.Accept Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Accept Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用面向连接的协议方法异步处理传入的连接尝试。Connection-oriented protocols can use the method to asynchronously process incoming connection attempts. 以异步方式接受连接使你能够发送和接收在单独的执行线程中的数据。Accepting connections asynchronously gives you the ability to send and receive data within a separate execution thread. 之前调用方法时，必须调用方法来侦听并对传入的连接请求进行排队。Before calling the method, you must call the method to listen for and queue incoming connection requests. 若要在完成时得到通知，必须创建实现的回调方法\ 委托并将挂钩到事件。To be notified of completion, you must create a callback method that implements the EventHandler\ delegate and hook it to the event. 下列属性和事件上的是必需的对象：The following properties and events on the object are required: - 调用方可以选择指定现有要通过指定用于传入连接用于属性。The caller can optionally specify an existing to use for the incoming connection by specifying the to use with the property. 如果属性为 null，新构造具有相同， ，和与当前并将设置为属性。If the property is null, a new is constructed with the same , , and as the current and set as the property. 调用方可能设置到在调用前要求任何用户状态对象的属性方法，以便在回叫方法可检索信息。The caller may set the property to any user state object desired before calling the method, so that the information will be retrievable in the callback method. 如果回调需要比单个对象的详细信息，可以创建一个小型类来保存作为成员的其他所需的状态信息。If the callback needs more information than a single object, a small class can be created to hold the other required state information as members. （可选） 可能要接收后套接字上的数据的初始块在其中提供一个缓冲区方法成功。Optionally, a buffer may be provided in which to receive the initial block of data on the socket after the method succeeds. 在这种情况下，属性应设置为包含数据的缓冲区，以接收和属性应设置为最大的数据的字节数，以接收缓冲区中。In this case, the property needs to be set to the buffer containing the data to receive and the property needs to be set to the maximum number of bytes of data to receive in the buffer. 可以使用设置这些属性方法。These properties can be set using the method. 传入的缓冲区的一部分将可供内部使用的基础 Winsock AcceptEx 调用。Part of the buffer passed in will be consumed internally for use by the underlying Winsock AcceptEx call. 这意味着返回的数据量始终为的值小于属性提供实例。This means that the amount of data returned will always be less than the value of the property on the instance provided. 在内部使用的缓冲区的量的套接字地址族有所不同。The amount of the buffer used internally varies based on the address family of the socket. 所需的最小缓冲区大小为 288 个字节。The minimum buffer size required is 288 bytes. 如果指定较大缓冲区大小，则应除了 Winsock AcceptEx 调用收到的地址数据之外一些额外的数据和将等待，直到收到此额外的数据。If a larger buffer size is specified, then the will expect some extra data other than the address data received by the Winsock AcceptEx call and will wait until this extra data is received. 如果发生超时，则连接将重置。If a timeout occurs, the connection is reset. 因此如果特定量的预期会有额外的数据，则应缓冲区大小设置为最小缓冲区大小加上此段中。So if extra data is expected of a specific amount, then the buffer size should be set to the minimum buffer size plus this amount. 完成回调方法应该检查属性来确定如果操作成功。The completion callback method should examine the property to determine if the operation was successful. 事件可发生在某些情况下，在没有连接已被接受时，使属性设置为。The event can occur in some cases when no connection has been accepted and cause the property to be set to . 这会导致端口扫描使用半开 SYN 类型扫描 (SYN-> SYN ACK-> RST 序列)。This can occur as a result of port scanning using a half-open SYN type scan (a SYN -> SYN-ACK -> RST sequence). 使用应用程序方法应准备好处理此情况。Applications using the method should be prepared to handle this condition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你使用的非阻塞，是一种好方法，以便确定是否将数据排队以进行读取，然后再调用。If you are using a non-blocking , is a good way to determine whether data is queued for reading, before calling . 可用的数据是在读取的网络缓冲区中排队的总数据量。The available data is the total amount of data queued in the network buffer for reading. 如果无数据排队网络缓冲区中返回 0。If no data is queued in the network buffer, returns 0. 如果远程主机关闭或关闭了连接，可以引发。If the remote host shuts down or closes the connection, can throw a . 如果你收到，使用属性来获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 FIONREAD 和可用的属性的调用 IOControl 的结果进行比较。The following code example compares the results of calling IOControl with FIONREAD and the Available property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用面向连接的协议方法异步处理传入的连接尝试。Connection-oriented protocols can use the method to asynchronously process incoming connection attempts. 以异步方式接受连接使你能够发送和接收在单独的执行线程中的数据。Accepting connections asynchronously gives you the ability to send and receive data within a separate execution thread. 之前调用方法时，必须调用方法来侦听并对传入的连接请求进行排队。Before calling the method, you must call the method to listen for and queue incoming connection requests. 你必须创建实现一个回调方法委托并将传递到其名称方法。You must create a callback method that implements the delegate and pass its name to the method. 若要这样做，请至少，你必须传递侦听对象传递给通过`state`参数。To do this, at the very minimum, you must pass the listening object to through the `state` parameter. 如果你的回调需要详细信息，你可以创建一个小型类来保存和其他必需的信息。If your callback needs more information, you can create a small class to hold the and the other required information. 将此类的实例传递方法通过`state`参数。Pass an instance of this class to the method through the `state` parameter. 你的回调方法应调用方法。Your callback method should invoke the method. 当你的应用程序调用，系统通常使用单独的线程来执行指定的回调方法，并阻止在直到检索到挂起的连接。When your application calls , the system usually uses a separate thread to execute the specified callback method and blocks on until a pending connection is retrieved. 将返回一个新对象可用于发送和接收与远程主机的数据。 will return a new object that you can use to send and receive data with the remote host. 不能使用此返回接受任何额外连接从连接队列。You cannot use this returned to accept any additional connections from the connection queue. 如果你想要阻止后调用的原始线程方法，请使用。If you want the original thread to block after you call the method, use . 在调用 Set 方法当你想要继续执行原始线程时的回调方法中。Call the Set method on a in the callback method when you want the original thread to continue executing. 系统还可能使用调用的线程来调用的回调方法。The system may also use the calling thread to invoke the callback method. 在这种情况下，属性对返回将设置，则指示已同步完成的方法。In this case, the property on the returned will be set to indicate that the method completed synchronously. 有关编写回调方法的更多信息，请参阅[委托作为回调方法进行封送](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。For additional information on writing callback methods see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md). 若要取消挂起调用方法，关闭。To cancel a pending call to the method, close the . 当方法调用的异步操作正在进行时，回调提供给调用方法。When the method is called while an asynchronous operation is in progress, the callback provided to the method is called. 后续调用方法会引发以指示已取消该操作。A subsequent call to the method will throw an to indicate that the operation has been cancelled. > [!NOTE] > 你可以使用属性返回的来标识远程主机的网络地址和端口号。You can use the property of the returned to identify the remote host's network address and port number. > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到，使用属性来获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档 MSDN 中有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 执行上下文 （安全上下文，模拟的用户，并调用上下文） 会进行缓存以便异步方法。The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous methods. 在特定上下文首次使用后 (异步特定方法、 特定实例和特定的回调)，以后使用该上下文将提高性能。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将以异步接收的传入连接。The following code example attempts to receive an incoming connection asynchronously. [!code-cpp[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/VB/source.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你使用的一种面向连接的协议，方法会启动到的连接的异步请求`remoteEP`参数。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, the method starts an asynchronous request for a connection to the `remoteEP` parameter. 如果你使用的是无连接协议，建立默认远程主机。If you are using a connectionless protocol, establishes a default remote host. 连接或以异步方式设置默认远程主机使你能够发送和接收在单独的执行线程中的数据。Connecting or setting the default remote host asynchronously gives you the ability to send and receive data within a separate execution thread. 你可以创建实现一个回调方法委托并将传递到其名称方法。You can create a callback method that implements the delegate and pass its name to the method. 至少，你必须传递到通过`state`参数。At the very minimum, you must pass the to through the `state` parameter. 如果你的回调需要详细信息，你可以创建一个小型类来保存，和其他必需的信息。If your callback needs more information, you can create a small class to hold the , and the other required information. 将此类的实例传递方法通过`state`参数。Pass an instance of this class to the method through the `state` parameter. 你的回调方法应调用方法。Your callback method should invoke the method. 当你的应用程序调用，系统将使用一个单独的线程执行的指定的回调方法，并阻止直到成功连接或引发异常。When your application calls , the system will use a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and will block on until the connects successfully or throws an exception. 如果你想要阻止后调用的原始线程方法，请使用。If you want the original thread to block after you call the method, use . 在调用 Set 方法当你想要继续执行原始线程时的回调方法中。Call the Set method on a in the callback method when you want the original thread to continue executing. 有关编写回调方法的更多信息，请参阅[委托作为回调方法进行封送](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。For additional information on writing callback methods see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md). 如果使用如 UDP 无连接协议时，不需要调用之前发送和接收数据。If you are using a connectionless protocol such as UDP, you do not have to call before sending and receiving data. 你可以使用和与远程主机通信。You can use and to communicate with a remote host. 如果调用，来自地址而不是指定默认的地址的任何数据报将被放弃。If you do call , any datagrams that arrive from an address other than the specified default will be discarded. 如果你想要将默认远程主机为广播地址，必须先调用并将广播设置为`true`。If you wish to set your default remote host to a broadcast address, you must first call and set Broadcast to `true`. 如果你不能将引发。If you cannot, will throw a . 如果你使用的是面向连接的协议，并且不调用之前调用，基础服务提供程序将分配的最合适的本地网络地址和端口号。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol and do not call before calling , the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate local network address and port number. 如果你使用的是无连接协议，直到你调用，则服务提供程序将不分配本地网络地址和端口号或方法。If you are using a connectionless protocol, the service provider will not assign a local network address and port number until you call the or method. 如果你想要更改默认远程主机时，调用再次使用所需终结点的方法。If you want to change the default remote host, call the method again with the desired endpoint. 若要取消挂起调用方法，关闭。To cancel a pending call to the method, close the . 当方法调用的异步操作正在进行时，回调提供给调用方法。When the method is called while an asynchronous operation is in progress, the callback provided to the method is called. 后续调用方法会引发以指示已取消该操作。A subsequent call to the method will throw an to indicate that the operation has been cancelled. > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到，使用属性来获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 如果以前已断开此套接字，然后必须调用该操作完成之前不会退出的线程上。If this socket has previously been disconnected, then must be called on a thread that will not exit until the operation is complete. 这是基础提供程序的限制。This is a limitation of the underlying provider. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 执行上下文 （安全上下文，模拟的用户，并调用上下文） 会进行缓存以便异步方法。The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous methods. 在特定上下文首次使用后 (异步特定方法、 特定实例和特定的回调)，以后使用该上下文将提高性能。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement. ## Examples 下面的代码示例启动异步连接尝试。The following code example initiates an asynchronous connection remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你使用的一个面向连接的协议，则可以调用方法来从远程终结点请求断开连接。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, you can call the method to request a disconnect from a remote endpoint. 如果`reuseSocket`是`true`，你可以重复使用套接字。If `reuseSocket` is `true`, you can reuse the socket. 方法使用一个单独的线程来调用指定的回调方法。The method uses a separate thread to invoke the specified callback method. 方法阻塞，直到挂起的断开连接已完成。The method blocks until the pending disconnect is complete. 有关编写回调方法的其他信息，请参阅[委托作为回调方法进行封送](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。For additional information on writing callback methods, see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md). > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到异常，请改用属性来获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a exception, use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建套接字进行异步通信，并将一些数据发送到远程主机。The following code example creates a socket for asynchronous communication and sends some data to a remote host. 当数据已发送时，调用以停止发送和接收活动。When the data has been sent, is called to stop the send and receive activity. 然后调用以开始断开连接请求。Then is called to begin a disconnect request. 完成请求后，属性将查询以测试是否断开连接的套接字。When the request completes, the property is queried to test whether the socket is disconnected. [!code-cpp[Nclsocketenhancements#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSocketEnhancements/CPP/nclsocketenhancements.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[Nclsocketenhancements#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSocketEnhancements/CS/nclsocketenhancements.cs#11)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 异步操作必须通过调用方法。The asynchronous operation must be completed by calling the method. 通常情况下，通过调用该方法`callback`委托。Typically, the method is invoked by the `callback` delegate. 此方法不会阻止，直到完成该操作。This method does not block until the operation is complete. 若要阻止该操作完成之前，请使用之一方法重载。To block until the operation is complete, use one of the method overloads. 若要取消挂起，调用方法。To cancel a pending , call the method. 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息，请参阅[异步调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到，使用属性来获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 在线程退出时，由给定线程启动的所有 i/o 操作已取消。All I/O initiated by a given thread is canceled when that thread exits. 如果在线程退出操作完成前，挂起的异步操作可能会失败。A pending asynchronous operation can fail if the thread exits before the operation completes. > [!NOTE] > `state` 是用户定义的实例化。`state` is an instantiation of a user-defined class. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 执行上下文 （安全上下文，模拟的用户，并调用上下文） 会进行缓存以便异步方法。The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous methods. 在特定上下文首次使用后 (异步特定方法、 特定实例和特定的回调)，以后使用该上下文将提高性能。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法会启动异步读取远程主机无连接数据报。The method starts asynchronously reading connectionless datagrams from a remote host. 调用方法使你能够接收在单独的执行线程中的数据。Calling the method gives you the ability to receive data within a separate execution thread. 你可以创建实现一个回调方法委托并将传递到其名称方法。You can create a callback method that implements the delegate and pass its name to the method. 为此，请至少，你`state`参数必须包含连接或默认用于进行通信。To do this, at the very minimum, your `state` parameter must contain the connected or default being used for communication. 如果你的回调需要详细信息，你可以创建一个小型类来保存和其他必需的信息。If your callback needs more information, you can create a small class to hold the and the other required information. 将此类的实例传递方法通过`state`参数。Pass an instance of this class to the method through the `state` parameter. 你的回调方法应调用方法。Your callback method should invoke the method. 当你的应用程序调用，系统将使用一个单独的线程执行指定的回调方法，它将阻塞直到读取数据或引发异常。When your application calls , the system will use a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and it will block on until the reads data or throws an exception. 如果你想要阻止后调用的原始线程方法，请使用。If you want the original thread to block after you call the method, use . 当你想要继续执行原始线程时，请在回调方法调用 Set 方法。Call the Set method on a T:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent in the callback method when you want the original thread to continue executing. 有关编写回调方法的其他信息，请参阅[委托作为回调方法进行封送](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。For additional information on writing callback methods, see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md). > [!NOTE] > 之前调用，必须显式将绑定本地终结点使用方法，或将引发。Before calling , you must explicitly bind the to a local endpoint using the method, or will throw a . 此方法将数据读入`buffer`参数，而捕获的远程主机从其发送数据的终结点。This method reads data into the `buffer` parameter, and captures the remote host endpoint from which the data is sent. 有关如何检索此终结点的信息，请参阅。For information on how to retrieve this endpoint, refer to . 此方法是最有用，如果你想要以异步方式从未知的主机或多个主机中接收无连接数据报。This method is most useful if you intend to asynchronously receive connectionless datagrams from an unknown host or multiple hosts. 在这些情况下，将读取到本地网络缓冲区接收到第一个排队数据报。In these cases, will read the first enqueued datagram received into the local network buffer. 如果你收到的数据报大于的大小`buffer`、方法将填充`buffer`尽可能可能，而引发的消息与。If the datagram you receive is larger than the size of `buffer`, the method will fill `buffer` with as much of the message as is possible, and throw a . 如果你使用的不可靠的协议，多余的数据将丢失。If you are using an unreliable protocol, the excess data will be lost. 如果你使用的是可靠的协议对过量数据将保留由服务提供商，你可以通过调用来检索它使用足够大的缓冲区的方法。If you are using a reliable protocol, the excess data will be retained by the service provider and you can retrieve it by calling the method with a large enough buffer. 若要确保始终返回远程主机终结点、 应用程序应显式绑定本地终结点使用方法，然后调用方法替换`optionLevel`参数设置为或视情况而定`optionName`参数设置为，和`optionValue`参数以启用此选项之前调用方法。To guarantee that the remote host endpoint is always returned, an application should explicitly bind the to a local endpoint using the method and then call the method with the `optionLevel` parameter set to or as appropriate, the `optionName` parameter set to , and the `optionValue` parameter to enable this option before calling the method. 否则，它是要发件人已发送的数据报数目之前接收方调用时不会返回的远程主机终结点可能方法。Otherwise, it is possible for the remote host endpoint to not be returned when the sender has sent a number of datagrams before the receiver has called the method. 尽管适用于无连接协议，你可以使用也是一个面向连接的协议。Although is intended for connectionless protocols, you can use a connection-oriented protocol as well. 如果你选择这样做，你必须首先可以建立远程主机的连接通过调用 / 方法或通过调用接受传入的连接请求或方法。If you choose to do so, you must first either establish a remote host connection by calling the / method or accept an incoming connection request by calling the or method. 如果调用方法时建立或接受连接之前，你将获取。If you call the method before establishing or accepting a connection, you will get a . 你还可以建立默认远程主机之前调用无连接协议方法。You can also establish a default remote host for a connectionless protocol prior to calling the method. 在这些情况下，任一方法将忽略`remoteEP`参数和仅接收从连接的数据或默认远程主机。In either of these cases, the method will ignore the `remoteEP` parameter and only receive data from the connected or default remote host. 对于面向连接的套接字，将读取原样可用直到达到指定的字节数多的数据`size`参数。With connection-oriented sockets, will read as much data as is available up to the number of bytes specified by the `size` parameter. 若要取消挂起，调用方法。To cancel a pending , call the method. > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到，使用属性来获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 执行上下文 （安全上下文，模拟的用户，并调用上下文） 会进行缓存以便异步方法。The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous methods. 在特定上下文首次使用后 (异步特定方法、 特定实例和特定的回调)，以后使用该上下文将提高性能。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement. ## Examples 下面的代码示例以异步方式从远程主机接收无连接数据报。The following code example asynchronously receives connectionless datagrams from a remote host. [!code-cpp[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#41](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/CPP/source.cpp#41)] [!code-csharp[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#41](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/CS/source.cs#41)] [!code-vb[Socket_Async_Send_Receive#41](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Async_Send_Receive/VB/source.vb#41)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 异步接收操作必须由调用完成方法。The asynchronous receive operation must be completed by calling the method. 通常情况下，通过调用该方法`asyncCallback`委托。Typically, the method is invoked by the `asyncCallback` delegate. 此方法不会阻止该操作完成之前。This method does not block until the operation completes. 若要阻止该操作完成之前，请使用方法。To block until the operation completes, use the method. 若要取消挂起，调用方法。To cancel a pending , call the method. 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息，请参阅[异步调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md) 此方法将数据读入`buffer`参数，并捕获的远程主机终结点从其发送数据，以及有关接收的数据包的信息。This method reads data into the `buffer` parameter, and captures the remote host endpoint from which the data is sent, as well as information about the received packet. 有关如何检索此终结点的信息，请参阅。For information on how to retrieve this endpoint, refer to . 此方法是最有用，如果你想要以异步方式从未知的主机或多个主机中接收无连接数据报。This method is most useful if you intend to asynchronously receive connectionless datagrams from an unknown host or multiple hosts. > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到，使用属性来获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法会启动异步发送操作中建立的远程主机， ， ，或方法。The method starts an asynchronous send operation to the remote host established in the , , , or method. 如果不首先调用将引发异常， ， ，或。 will throw an exception if you do not first call , , , or . 调用方法使你能够发送单独的执行线程中的数据。Calling the method gives you the ability to send data within a separate execution thread. 你可以创建实现一个回调方法委托并将传递到其名称方法。You can create a callback method that implements the delegate and pass its name to the method. 为此，请至少，你`state`参数必须包含连接或默认用于进行通信。To do this, at the very minimum, your `state` parameter must contain the connected or default being used for communication. 如果你的回调需要详细信息，可以创建一个小型类或结构，用于保存和其他必需的信息。If your callback needs more information, you can create a small class or structure to hold the and the other required information. 将此类的实例传递方法通过`state`参数。Pass an instance of this class to the method through the `state` parameter. 你的回调方法应调用方法。Your callback method should invoke the method. 当你的应用程序调用，系统将使用一个单独的线程执行的指定的回调方法，并阻止直到发送请求的字节数或引发异常。When your application calls , the system will use a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and will block on until the sends the number of bytes requested or throws an exception. 如果你想要阻止后调用的原始线程方法，请使用方法。If you want the original thread to block after you call the method, use the method. 当你想要继续执行原始线程时，请在回调方法调用 Set 方法。Call the Set method on a T:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent in the callback method when you want the original thread to continue executing. 有关编写回调方法的更多信息，请参阅[委托作为回调方法进行封送](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。For additional information on writing callback methods see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md). 适用于面向连接的协议，尽管还应用于无连接协议，前提是你第一次调用或方法来建立默认远程主机。Although intended for connection-oriented protocols, also works for connectionless protocols, provided that you first call the or method to establish a default remote host. 如果你使用的无连接协议和计划将数据发送到若干不同的主机，则应使用。If you are using a connectionless protocol and plan to send data to several different hosts, you should use . 可以使用甚至已建立默认远程主机使用后。It is okay to use even after you have established a default remote host with . 你还可以更改默认远程主机之前调用通过另一个调用或。You can also change the default remote host prior to calling by making another call to or . 使用无连接协议，你还必须确保你的缓冲区的大小不能超过基础服务提供程序的最大的数据包大小。With connectionless protocols, you must also be sure that the size of your buffer does not exceed the maximum packet size of the underlying service provider. 如果是这样，将不发送数据报和将引发。If it does, the datagram will not be sent and will throw a . 如果指定标记为`socketflags`参数，发送的无法路由的数据。If you specify the flag as the `socketflags` parameter, the data you are sending will not be routed. > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到，使用属性来获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 在线程退出时，由给定线程启动的所有 i/o 操作已取消。All I/O initiated by a given thread is canceled when that thread exits. 如果在线程退出操作完成前，挂起的异步操作可能会失败。A pending asynchronous operation can fail if the thread exits before the operation completes. > [!NOTE] > `state` 是用户定义的实例化。`state` is an instantiation of a user-defined class. > [!NOTE] > 成功完成后发送不指示已成功传递数据。The successful completion of a send does not indicate that the data was successfully delivered. 如果没有缓冲区空间以容纳要传输的数据传输系统中可用，除非套接字置于阻止模式下，将阻止发送。If no buffer space is available within the transport system to hold the data to be transmitted, send will block unless the socket has been placed in nonblocking mode. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 执行上下文 （安全上下文，模拟的用户，并调用上下文） 会进行缓存以便异步方法。The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous methods. 在特定上下文首次使用后 (异步特定方法、 特定实例和特定的回调)，以后使用该上下文将提高性能。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement.

当你的应用程序调用，系统将使用一个单独的线程执行的指定的回调方法，并阻止直到发送请求的字节数或引发异常。When your application calls , the system will use a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and will block on until the sends the number of bytes requested or throws an exception. 如果你想要阻止后调用的原始线程方法，请使用方法。If you want the original thread to block after you call the method, use the method. 在调用 Set 方法当你想要继续执行原始线程时的回调方法中。Call the Set method on a in the callback method when you want the original thread to continue executing. 有关编写回调方法的更多信息，请参阅[委托作为回调方法进行封送](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。For additional information on writing callback methods see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md). 适用于面向连接的协议，尽管还应用于无连接协议，前提是你第一次调用或方法来建立默认远程主机。Although intended for connection-oriented protocols, also works for connectionless protocols, provided that you first call the or method to establish a default remote host. 如果你使用的无连接协议和计划将数据发送到若干不同的主机，则应使用。If you are using a connectionless protocol and plan to send data to several different hosts, you should use . 可以使用甚至已建立默认远程主机使用后。It is okay to use even after you have established a default remote host with . 你还可以更改默认远程主机之前调用通过另一个调用或。You can also change the default remote host prior to calling by making another call to or . 使用无连接协议，你还必须确保你的缓冲区的大小不能超过基础服务提供程序的最大的数据包大小。With connectionless protocols, you must also be sure that the size of your buffer does not exceed the maximum packet size of the underlying service provider. 如果是这样，将不发送数据报和将引发。If it does, the datagram will not be sent and will throw a . 如果指定标记为`socketflags`参数，发送的无法路由的数据。If you specify the flag as the `socketflags` parameter, the data you are sending will not be routed. > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到，使用属性来获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 在线程退出时，由给定线程启动的所有 i/o 操作已取消。All I/O initiated by a given thread is canceled when that thread exits. 如果在线程退出操作完成前，挂起的异步操作可能会失败。A pending asynchronous operation can fail if the thread exits before the operation completes. > [!NOTE] > `state` 是用户定义的实例化。`state` is an instantiation of a user-defined class. > [!NOTE] > 成功完成后发送不指示已成功传递数据。The successful completion of a send does not indicate that the data was successfully delivered. 如果没有缓冲区空间以容纳要传输的数据传输系统中可用，除非套接字置于阻止模式下，将阻止发送。If no buffer space is available within the transport system to hold the data to be transmitted, send will block unless the socket has been placed in nonblocking mode. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 执行上下文 （安全上下文，模拟的用户，并调用上下文） 会进行缓存以便异步方法。The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous methods. 在特定上下文首次使用后 (异步特定方法、 特定实例和特定的回调)，以后使用该上下文将提高性能。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载将文件发送`fileName`到连接的套接字。This overload sends the file `fileName` to the connected socket. 如果`fileName`是在本地目录中，则可以标识与只是文件的名称; 否则，必须指定完整路径和文件的名称。If `fileName` is in the local directory, it may be identified with just the name of the file; otherwise, the full path and name of the file must be specified. 通配符 ("...\\\myfile.txt") 和 UNC 共享名 ("\\\\\\\shared 目录\\\myfile.txt") 支持。Wildcards ("..\\\myfile.txt") and UNC share names ("\\\\\\\shared directory\\\myfile.txt") are supported. 如果未找到文件，该异常引发。If the file is not found, the exception is thrown. 此方法使用`TransmitFile`Windows 套接字 2 API 中找到函数。This method uses the `TransmitFile` function found in the Windows Sockets 2 API. 有关详细信息`TransmitFile`函数和其标志，请参阅 MSDN 库中的 Windows 套接字文档。For more information about the `TransmitFile` function and its flags, see the Windows Sockets documentation in the MSDN Library. 方法会启动异步发送操作中建立的远程主机，， ，或方法。The method starts an asynchronous send operation to the remote host established in the ,, , or methods. 引发异常，如果不首先调用， ， ，或。 throws an exception if you do not first call , , , or . 调用方法使你能够发送单独的执行线程中的文件。Calling the method enables you to send a file within a separate execution thread. 若要完成该操作，你可以创建由调用的回调方法委托参数。To complete the operation, you can create a callback method that is invoked by the delegate parameter. 为此，请至少，`state`参数必须包含对象用于进行通信。To do this, at the very minimum, the `state` parameter must contain the object being used for communication. 如果你的回调需要详细信息，可以创建类或结构，用于保存和其他必需的信息。If your callback needs more information, you can create a class or structure to hold the and the other required information. 将为此自定义对象的实例传递方法通过`state`参数。Pass an instance of this custom object to the method through the `state` parameter. 你的回调方法必须调用方法。Your callback method must invoke the method. 当你的应用程序调用，系统将使用一个单独的线程执行指定的回调方法，并阻止在直到发送完整的文件或引发异常。When your application calls , the system uses a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and blocks on until the sends the entire file or throws an exception. 有关编写回调方法的更多信息，请参阅[委托作为回调方法进行封送](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md)。For additional information on writing callback methods see [Marshaling a Delegate as a Callback Method](~/docs/framework/interop/marshaling-a-delegate-as-a-callback-method.md). 适用于面向连接的协议，尽管还应用于无连接协议，前提是你第一次调用或方法来建立默认远程主机。Although intended for connection-oriented protocols, also works for connectionless protocols, provided that you first call the or method to establish a default remote host. 使用无连接协议，则必须确保你的文件的大小不超过基础服务提供程序的最大的数据包大小。With connectionless protocols, you must be sure that the size of your file does not exceed the maximum packet size of the underlying service provider. 如果是这样，不会发送数据报和引发异常。If it does, the datagram is not sent and throws a exception. > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到异常，请改用属性来获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a exception, use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > 执行上下文 （安全上下文，模拟的用户，并调用上下文） 会进行缓存以便异步方法。The execution context (the security context, the impersonated user, and the calling context) is cached for the asynchronous methods. 在特定上下文首次使用后 (异步特定方法、 特定实例和特定的回调)，以后使用该上下文将提高性能。After the first use of a particular context (a specific asynchronous method, a specific instance, and a specific callback), subsequent uses of that context will see a performance improvement. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并连接的套接字进行异步通信。The following code example creates and connects a socket for asynchronous communication. 首先，"text.txt"该文件是以异步方式发送，到远程主机。First, the file "text.txt" is sent asynchronously to the remote host. 回调委托调用完成传输。The callback delegate calls to complete the transmission. connection-oriented protocols. 你可以创建实现一个回调方法委托并将传递到其名称方法。You can create a callback method that implements the delegate and pass its name to the method. 为此，请至少，你`state`参数必须包含连接或默认用于进行通信。To do this, at a small class to hold the , and the other required information. 将此类的实例传递方法通过`state`参数。Pass an instance of this class to the method through the `state` parameter. 你的回调方法应调用方法。Your callback method should invoke the method. 当你的应用程序调用，系统将使用一个单独的线程执行的指定的回调方法，并阻止直到发送请求的字节数或引发异常。When your application calls , the system will use a separate thread to execute the specified callback method, and will block on until the sends the number of bytes requested or throws an exception. 如果你想要阻止后调用的原始线程方法，请使用方法。If you want the original thread to block after you call the method, use the method. 当你想要继续执行原始线程时，请在回调方法调用 Set 方法。Call the Set method on a T:System.Threading.ManualResetEvent in the callback method when you want the original thread to continue executing. you are using a connectionless protocol, you do not need to establish a default remote host with the or method prior to calling . 只需执行此操作，如果你想要调用方法。You only need to do this if you intend to call the port number. 如果你想要选择可用端口的基础服务提供程序，请使用端口号 0。Use a port number of zero if you want the underlying service provider to select a free port. 如果你需要确定分配的本地网络地址和端口号，则可以使用属性后的方法已成功完成。If you need to identify remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法如果你需要使用特定的本地终结点。Use the method if you need to use a specific local endpoint. 必须调用才能调用方法。You must call before you can call the method. 不需要调用之前使用方法除非你需要使用特定的本地终结点。You do not need to call before using the method unless you need to use a specific local endpoint. 你可以使用无连接和面向连接的协议方法。You can use the method on both connectionless and connection-oriented protocols. 之前调用，你必须首先创建本地从想要进行数据通信。Before calling , you must first create the local from which you intend to communicate data. 如果你不关心哪些本地地址分配，你可以创建使用地址参数，以及基础服务提供程序将分配的最合适的网络地址。If you do not care which local address is assigned, you can create an using as the address parameter, and the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate network address. 这可能有助于简化你的应用程序，如果你有多个网络接口。This might help simplify your application if you have multiple network interfaces. 如果你不关心使用哪个本地端口，则可以创建使用 0 作为端口号。If you do not care which local port is used, you can create an using 0 for the port number. 在这种情况下，服务提供商将分配 1024年和 5000 之间可用的端口号。In this case, the service provider will assign an available port number between 1024 and 5000. 如果使用上面的方法，你可能会发现已通过调用分配了哪些本地网络地址和端口数量。If you use the above approach, you can discover what local network address and port number has been assigned by calling the . 如果你使用的一种面向连接的协议，后所做的调用不会返回之前的本地分配的网络地址或方法。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, will not return the locally assigned network address until after you have made a call to the or method. 如果你使用的是无连接协议，将不具有访问此信息，直到已完成发送或接收。If you are using a connectionless protocol, you will not have access to this information until you have completed a send or receive. 如果 UDP 套接字想要接收上接收数据包的接口信息应该与套接字选项设置为显式调用方法后立即调用方法。If a UDP socket wants to receive interface information on received packets, the method should be explicitly called with the socket option set to immediately after calling the method. > [!NOTE] > 如果你想要接收多播数据报，则必须调用方法具有多路广播的端口号。If you intend to receive multicast datagrams, you must call remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否处于阻止模式。The property indicates whether a is in blocking mode. 如果你是在阻止模式下，并且进行方法调用这不会立即完成，你的应用程序将请求的操作完成之前阻止执行。If you are in blocking mode, and you make a method call which does not complete immediately, your application will block execution until the requested operation completes. 如果你想执行要继续即使请求的操作未完成，更改属性`false`。If you want execution to continue even though the requested operation is not complete, change the property to `false`. 属性不起作用对异步方法。The property has no effect on asynchronous methods. 如果你是发送和异步接收数据，并想要阻止执行，使用类。If you are sending and receiving data asynchronously and want to block execution, use the class. > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到，使用属性来获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

summary.span: Closes the connection and releases all associated resources.

span.span: Closes the connection and releases all associated resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法关闭远程主机连接并释放所有托管和非托管资源与关联。The method closes the remote host connection and releases all managed and unmanaged resources associated with the . 结算时，属性设置为`false`。Upon closing, the property is set to `false`. 对于面向连接的协议，建议您调用之前调用方法。For connection-oriented protocols, it is recommended that you call before calling the method. 这可确保发送和关闭之前连接的套接字上接收到的所有数据。This ensures that all data is sent and received on the connected socket before it is closed. 如果你需要调用而无需首先调用，你可以确保数据排队等待传出传输将发送通过设置选项设为`false`并指定非零的超时间隔。If you need to call without first calling , you can ensure that data queued for outgoing transmission will be sent by setting the option to `false` and specifying a non-zero time-out interval. 然后将阻止状态，直到发送此数据，或直到指定的超时时间已到。 will then block until this data is sent or until the specified time-out expires. 如果你设置到`false`并指定零的超时间隔、释放连接并自动放弃传出排队的数据。If you set to `false` and specify a zero time-out interval, releases the connection and automatically discards outgoing queued data. > [!NOTE] > 若要设置套接字选项`false`，创建，将启用的属性设置为`true`，并设置到所需的超时期间的属性。To set the socket option to `false`, create a , set the enabled property to `true`, and set the property to the desired time out period. 使用此连同套接字选项调用方法。Use this along with the socket option to call the method. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例关闭。The following code example closes a . [!code-cpp[Classic Socket.Close Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Close Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Socket.Close Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Close Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Socket.Close Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Close Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你使用的使用面向连接的协议 TCP，例如方法以同步方式网络之间建立连接和指定的远程终结点。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol such as TCP, the method synchronously establishes a network connection between and the specified remote endpoint. 如果你使用的是无连接协议，建立默认远程主机。If you are using a connectionless protocol, establishes a default remote host. 调用后，你可以将数据发送到远程设备与方法，或从远程设备与接收数据方法。After you call , you can send data to the remote device with the method, or receive data from the remote device with the method. 如果使用如 UDP 无连接协议时，不需要调用之前发送和接收数据。If you are using a connectionless protocol such as UDP, you do not have to call before sending and receiving data. 你可以使用和能够同步与远程主机通信。You can use and to synchronously communicate with a remote host. 如果调用，来自地址而不是指定默认的地址的任何数据报将被放弃。If you do call , any datagrams that arrive from an address other than the specified default will be discarded. 如果你想要将默认远程主机为广播地址，则必须首先调用方法并设置套接字选项设为，或将引发。If you want to set your default remote host to a broadcast address, you must first call the method and set the socket option to , or will throw a . 如果你收到，使用属性来获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. 方法将一直阻止，除非专门设置属性`false`之前调用。The method will block, unless you specifically set the property to `false` prior to calling . 如果你使用一个面向连接的协议，如 TCP 和你确实禁用了阻止，将引发因为它需要时间来建立连接。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol like TCP and you do disable blocking, will throw a because it needs time to make the connection. 无连接协议不会引发异常，因为它们只需要建立默认远程主机。Connectionless protocols will not throw an exception because they simply establish a default remote host. 你可以使用以获得特定错误代码。You can use to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. 如果 WSAEWOULDBLOCK 返回的错误，已由一个面向连接的启动远程主机连接，但未尚未成功完成。If the error returned WSAEWOULDBLOCK, the remote host connection has been initiated by a connection-oriented , but has not yet completed successfully. 使用方法来确定何时完成连接。Use the method to determine when the is finished connecting. > [!NOTE] > 如果你使用一个面向连接的协议，并且未调用之前调用，基础服务提供程序将分配的本地网络地址和端口号。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol and did not call before calling , the underlying service provider will assign the local network address and port number. 如果你使用的是无连接协议，服务提供程序将不会分配本地网络地址和端口号，直到完成发送或接收操作。If you are using a connectionless protocol, the service provider will not assign a local network address and port number until you complete a send or receive operation. 如果你想要更改默认远程主机时，调用再次使用所需终结点。If you want to change the default remote host, call again with the desired endpoint. > [!NOTE] > 如果之前断开连接的套接字，然后无法使用此方法以恢复连接。If the socket has been previously disconnected, then you cannot use this method to restore the connection. 使用异步之一方法重新连接。Use one of the asynchronous methods to reconnect. 这是基础提供程序的限制。This is a limitation of the underlying provider. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例连接到远程终结点，并接着验证连接。The following code example connects to a remote endpoint and then verifies the connection. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在调用之后立即通常使用此方法，这可以针对单个主机返回多个 IP 地址。This method is typically used immediately after a call to , which can return multiple IP addresses for a single host. 如果你使用的使用面向连接的协议 TCP，例如方法以同步方式网络之间建立连接和指定的远程终结点。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol such as TCP, the method synchronously establishes a network connection between and the specified remote endpoint. 如果你使用的是无连接协议，建立默认远程主机。If you are using a connectionless protocol, establishes a default remote host. 调用后你可以将数据发送到远程设备与方法，或从远程设备与接收数据方法。After you call you can send data to the remote device with the method, or receive data from the remote device with the method. 如果使用如 UDP 无连接协议时，不需要调用之前发送和接收数据。If you are using a connectionless protocol such as UDP, you do not have to call before sending and receiving data. 你可以使用和能够同步与远程主机通信。You can use and to synchronously communicate with a remote host. 如果调用来自地址而不是指定默认的地址的任何数据报将被放弃。If you do call any datagrams that arrive from an address other than the specified default will be discarded. 如果你想要将默认远程主机为广播地址，则必须首先调用方法并设置套接字选项设为，或将引发。If you want to set your default remote host to a broadcast address, you must first call the method and set the socket option to , or will throw a . 如果你收到，使用属性来获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have unless you specifically set the property to `false` prior to calling . 如果你使用一个面向连接的协议，如 TCP 和你确实禁用了阻止，将引发因为它需要时间来建立连接。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol like TCP and you do disable blocking, will throw a because it needs time to make the connection. 无连接协议不会引发异常，因为它们只需要建立默认远程主机。Connectionless protocols will not throw an exception because they simply establish a default remote host. 你可以使用以获得特定错误代码。You can use to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. 如果 WSAEWOULDBLOCK 返回的错误，已由一个面向连接的启动远程主机连接，但未尚未成功完成。If the error returned WSAEWOULDBLOCK, the remote host connection has been initiated by a connection-oriented , but has not yet completed successfully. 使用方法来确定何时完成连接。Use the method to determine when the is finished connecting. > [!NOTE] > 如果你使用一个面向连接的协议，并且未调用之前调用，基础服务提供程序将分配的本地网络地址和端口号。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol and did not call before calling , the underlying service provider will assign the local network address and port number. 如果你使用的是无连接协议，服务提供程序将不会分配本地网络地址和端口号，直到完成发送或接收操作。If you are using a connectionless protocol, the service provider will not assign a local network address and port number until you complete a send or receive operation. 如果你想要更改默认远程主机时，调用再次使用所需终结点。If you want to change the default remote host, call again with the desired endpoint. > [!NOTE] > 如果之前断开连接的套接字，然后无法使用此方法以恢复连接。If the socket has been previously disconnected, then you cannot use this method to restore the connection. 使用异步之一方法重新连接。Use one of the asynchronous methods to reconnect. 这是基础提供程序的限制。This is a limitation of the underlying provider. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你使用的一种面向连接的协议，方法会启动与远程主机的连接的异步请求。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, the method starts an asynchronous request for a connection to the remote host. 如果你使用的是无连接协议，建立默认远程主机。If you are using a connectionless protocol, establishes a default remote host. 若要在完成时得到通知，必须创建实现的回调方法\ 委托和附加到回调事件。To be notified of completion, you must create a callback method that implements the EventHandler\ delegate and attach the callback to the event. 调用方必须设置属性要连接到的远程主机。The caller must set the property to the of the remote host to connect to. 调用方可能设置到在调用前要求任何用户状态对象的属性方法，以便在回叫方法可检索信息。The caller may set the property to any user state object desired before calling the method, so that the information will be retrievable in the callback method. 如果回调需要比单个对象的详细信息，可以创建一个小型类来保存作为成员的其他所需的状态信息。If the callback needs more information than a single object, a small class can be created to hold the other required state information as members. 如果使用如 UDP 无连接协议时，不需要调用之前发送和接收数据。If you are using a connectionless protocol such as UDP, you do not have to call before sending and receiving data. 你可以使用和与远程主机通信。You can use and to communicate with a remote host. 如果调用，来自地址而不是指定默认的地址的任何数据报将被放弃。If you do call , any datagrams that arrive from an address other than the specified default will be discarded. 如果你想要更改默认远程主机时，调用再次使用所需终结点的方法。If you want to change the default remote host, call the method again with the desired endpoint. 如果你想要设置为广播地址的默认远程主机，必须先调用并将广播设置为`true`。If you wish to set the default remote host to a broadcast address, you must first call and set Broadcast to `true`. 如果不执行此操作，方法会引发。If this is not done, the method will throw a . 下列属性和事件上的是必需的对象：The following properties and events on the object are required: - - （可选） 缓冲区可能会提供它以原子方式发送后的套接字上方法成功。Optionally, a buffer may be provided which will atomically be sent on the socket after the method succeeds. 在这种情况下，属性应设置为包含数据的缓冲区，以发送和属性应设置为数据的字节数，以从该缓冲区发送。In this case, the property needs to be set to the buffer containing the data to send and the property needs to be set to the number of bytes of data to send from the buffer. 一旦建立的连接，该缓冲区中的数据被发送。Once a connection is established, this buffer of data is sent. 如果你使用的是面向连接的协议，并且不调用之前调用，基础服务提供程序将分配的最合适的本地网络地址和端口号。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol and do not call before calling , the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate local network address and port number. 如果你使用的是无连接协议，直到你调用，则服务提供程序将不分配本地网络 IP 地址和端口号或方法。If you are using a connectionless protocol, the service provider will not assign a local network IP address and port number until you call the or methods. 方法抛出异常如果的地址族和不是相同的地址族。The method throws if the address family of the and the are not the same address family. > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到调用此方法时，使用属性来获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a when calling this method, use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Connected`属性获取的连接状态截止到最后一个的 I/O 操作。The `Connected` property gets the connection state of the as of the last I/O operation. 如果该属性返回`false`、要么从未连接，或已断开连接。When it returns `false`, the was either never connected, or is no longer connected. 值属性反映截至最近的操作连接的状态。The value of the property reflects the state of the connection as of the most recent operation. 如果你需要确定连接的当前状态，请调用阻止、 零字节发送。If you need to determine the current state of the connection, make a nonblocking, zero-byte Send call. 如果调用成功返回，或者引发 WAEWOULDBLOCK 错误代码 (10035)，则仍会连接套接字;否则，套接字已断开连接。If the call returns successfully or throws a WAEWOULDBLOCK error code (10035), then the socket is still connected; otherwise, the socket is no longer connected. 如果调用用户数据报协议 (UDP) 套接字上,属性始终返回`true`; 但是，此操作不会更改的 UDP 固有无连接的特点。If you call on a User Datagram Protocol (UDP) socket, the property always returns `true`; however, this action does not change the inherent connectionless nature of UDP. ## Examples 下面的代码示例连接到远程终结点，检查属性，并检查连接的当前状态。The following code example connects to a remote endpoint, checks the property, and checks the current state of the connection. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你使用的一个面向连接的协议，你可以使用此方法关闭套接字。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, you can use this method to close the socket. 此方法将结束的连接和集属性`false`。This method ends the connection and sets the property to `false`. 但是，如果`reuseSocket`是`true`，你可以重复使用套接字。However, if `reuseSocket` is `true`, you can reuse the socket. 若要确保所有数据是发送和接收套接字关闭之前，应调用之前调用方法。To ensure that all data is sent and received before the socket is closed, you should call before calling the method. 如果你需要调用而无需首先调用，你可以设置选项设为`false`和指定非零的超时间隔，以确保排队等待发送传出传输的数据。If you need to call without first calling , you can set the option to `false` and specify a nonzero time-out interval to ensure that data queued for outgoing transmission is sent. 然后阻止，直到发送数据，或直到指定的超时时间已到。 then blocks until the data is sent or until the specified time-out expires. 如果你设置到`false`并指定零的超时间隔、释放连接并自动放弃传出排队的数据。If you set to `false` and specify a zero time-out interval, releases the connection and automatically discards outgoing queued data. > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到，使用属性来获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建进行同步通信套接字，并将一些数据发送到远程主机。The following code example creates a socket for synchronous communication and sends some data to a remote host. 然后，它调用，以停止发送和接收活动，和以关闭套接字连接。It then calls , to stop the send and receive activity, and , to close the socket connection. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 `Dispose` 后，应调用 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法使 处于不可用状态。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用`Dispose`，必须释放对所有引用以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，占用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 `Dispose` 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 其大小超过最大传输单元 (MTU) 的传输介质时，数据报需要碎片。Datagrams require fragmentation when their size exceeds the Maximum Transfer Unit (MTU) of the transmission medium. 可以对数据报消息分片通过发送主机 （所有 Internet 协议版本） 或中间的路由器 (Internet 协议版本 4 仅)。Datagrams may be fragmented by the sending host (all Internet Protocol versions) or an intermediate router (Internet Protocol Version 4 only). 如果必须碎片数据报，和选项设置、 数据报将被丢弃，以及 Internet 控制消息协议 (ICMP) 错误消息发送回数据报的发件人。If a datagram must be fragmented, and the option is set, the datagram is discarded, and an Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) error message is sent back to the sender of the datagram. 传输控制协议 (TCP) 套接字上设置此属性将产生任何影响。Setting this property on a Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) socket will have no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 目标进程应使用创建重复的套接字实例。The target process should use to create the duplicate socket instance. 如果调用多次使用相同的字节数组作为每个调用的参数的构造函数，你将创建多个托管具有相同的基础套接字的实例。If you call the constructor multiple times with the same byte array as the argument for each call, you will create multiple managed instances with the same underlying socket. 强烈建议不要使用这种做法。This practice is strongly discouraged. 如果进程创建套接字使用异步方法 (或)，必须首先设置过程属性设置为 true; 否则为套接字绑定到完成端口的创建过程中，这可能导致上目标进程引发。If the process creating the socket uses asynchronous methods ( or ), the process must first set the property to true; otherwise, the socket is bound to the completion port of the creating process, which may cause an to be thrown on the target process.

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the can send or receive broadcast packets.

span.span: if the allows broadcast packets; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 广播将仅限于特定子网，并且必须使用用户数据报协议 (UDP)。有关 Internet 协议版本 4，您可以通过将数据包发送到 255.255.255.255; 广播本地子网或者，你可以使用定向广播的地址，这是与设置的主机部分中的所有位的 Internet 协议 (IP) 地址的网络部分。Broadcasting is limited to a specific subnet, and must use User Datagram Protocol (UDP.) For Internet Protocol version 4, you can broadcast to your local subnet by sending a packet to 255.255.255.255; or you can use the directed broadcast address, which is the network portion of an Internet Protocol (IP) address with all bits set in the host portion. 例如，如果你的 IP 地址为 192.168.1.40 （C 类地址，网络掩码为 255.255.255.0-网络部分是前三个八位字节，和的主机部分是最后一个八位字节），则定向广播的地址是 192.168.1.255。For example, if your IP address is 192.168.1.40 (a Class C address, with a netmask of 255.255.255.0 -- the network portion is the first three octets, and the host portion is the last octet), your directed broadcast address is 192.168.1.255. 传输控制协议 (TCP) 套接字上设置此属性将产生任何影响。Setting this property on a Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) socket will have no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 完成对调用。 completes a call to . 之前调用，你需要创建一个由调用的回调方法委托。Before calling , you need to create a callback method that is invoked by the delegate. 此回调方法在单独的线程中，执行之后, 由系统调用方法返回。This callback method executes in a separate thread, and is called by the system after the method returns. 在回调方法中，调用方法`asyncResult`参数来获取对其进行连接尝试。Within the callback method, call the method of the `asyncResult` parameter to obtain the on which the connection attempt is being made. 获取之后，可以调用方法才能成功完成连接尝试。After obtaining the , you can call the method to successfully complete the connection attempt. `buffer`的此重载的参数包含对的调用中收到的数据和`bytesTransferred`参数包含已传输的调用中的字节数。The `buffer` parameter of this overload contains the data that was received in the call to and the `bytesTransferred` parameter contains the number of bytes that were transferred in the call. 方法阻止，直到连接正在等待传入的连接队列中。The method blocks until a connection is pending in the incoming connection queue. 方法接受传入连接，并返回一个新可用来将数据发送到和从远程主机接收数据。The method accepts the incoming connection and returns a new that can be used to send data to and receive data from the remote host. > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到，使用属性来获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用创建和连接套接字并接受前 10 个字节的数据。The following code example uses to create and connect a socket and accept the initial 10 bytes of data. 回调委托调用来结束异步请求。The callback delegate calls to end the asynchronous request. 在中返回传输的字节数和数据`buffer`和`bytesTransferred`此方法的参数并在控制台上显示。The number of bytes transmitted and the data are returned in the `buffer` and `bytesTransferred` parameters of this method and are displayed on the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks 完成对调用。 completes a call to . 之前调用，你需要创建实现一个回调方法委托。Before calling , you need to create a callback method that implements the delegate. 此回调方法在单独的线程中，执行之后, 由系统调用方法返回。This callback method executes in a separate thread, and is called by the system after the method returns. 它必须接受`asyncResult`参数从返回方法。It must accept the `asyncResult` parameter returned from the method. 在回调方法中，调用方法`asyncResult`参数来获取对其进行连接尝试。Within the callback method, call the method of the `asyncResult` parameter to obtain the on which the connection attempt is being made. 获取之后，可以调用方法才能成功完成连接尝试。After obtaining the , you can call the method to successfully complete the connection attempt. 方法阻止，直到连接正在等待传入的连接队列中。The method blocks until a connection is pending in the incoming connection queue. 方法接受传入连接，并返回一个新可用来将数据发送到和从远程主机接收数据。The method accepts the incoming connection and returns a new that can be used to send data to and receive data from the remote host. > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到，使用属性来获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例结束的异步请求并创建一个新无法接受传入的连接请求。The following code example ends an asynchronous request and creates a new to accept an incoming connection request. 有关完整示例，演示与套接字的异步通信的说明，请参阅[套接字的代码示例](~/docs/framework/network-programming/socket-code-examples.md)。For a complete example that demonstrates asynchronous communications with sockets, see [Socket Code Examples](~/docs/framework/network-programming/socket-code-examples.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 完成对调用。 completes a call to . 之前调用，你需要创建一个由调用的回调方法委托。Before calling , you need to create a callback method that is invoked by the delegate. 此回调方法在单独的线程中，执行之后, 由系统调用方法返回。This callback method executes in a separate thread, and is called by the system after the method returns. 它必须接受`asyncResult`参数从返回方法。It must accept the `asyncResult` parameter returned from the method. 在回调方法中，调用方法`asyncResult`参数来获取对其进行连接尝试。Within the callback method, call the method of the `asyncResult` parameter to obtain the on which the connection attempt is being made. 获取之后，可以调用方法才能成功完成连接尝试。After obtaining the , you can call the method to successfully complete the connection attempt. `buffer`的此重载的参数包含对的调用中收到的数据和`bytesTransferred`参数包含已传输的调用中的字节数。The `buffer` parameter of this overload contains the data that was received in the call to and the `bytesTransferred` parameter contains the number of bytes that were transferred in the call. 方法阻止，直到连接正在等待传入的连接队列中。The method blocks until a connection is pending in the incoming connection queue. 方法接受传入连接，并返回一个新可用来将数据发送到和从远程主机接收数据。The method accepts the incoming connection and returns a new that can be used to send data to and receive data from the remote host. > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到，使用属性来获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用创建和连接套接字并接受前 10 个字节的数据。The following code example uses to create and connect a socket and accept the initial 10 bytes of data. 回调委托调用来结束异步请求。The callback delegate calls to end the asynchronous request. 在中返回传输的字节数和数据`buffer`和`bytesTransferred`此方法的参数并在控制台上显示。The number of bytes transmitted and the data are returned in the `buffer` and `bytesTransferred` parameters of this method and are displayed on the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在中启动一个完成异步远程主机连接请求的阻止方法方法。 is a blocking method that completes the asynchronous remote host connection request started in the method. 之前调用，你需要创建实现一个回调方法委托。Before calling , you need to create a callback method that implements the delegate. 此回调方法在一个单独的线程中执行之后, 由系统调用返回。This callback method executes in a separate thread and is called by the system after returns. 回调方法必须接受返回作为参数的方法。The callback method must accept the returned by the method as a parameter. 在回调方法中，调用方法参数来获取对其进行连接尝试。Within the callback method, call the method of the parameter to obtain the on which the connection attempt is being made. 获取之后，可以调用方法才能成功完成连接尝试。After obtaining the , you can call the method to successfully complete the connection attempt. > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到，使用属性来获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例结束异步连接尝试。The following code example ends the asynchronous connection attempt. 有关完整示例，演示与套接字的异步通信的说明，请参阅[套接字的代码示例](~/docs/framework/network-programming/socket-code-examples.md)。For a complete example that demonstrates asynchronous communications with sockets, see [Socket Code Examples](~/docs/framework/network-programming/socket-code-examples.md).
