remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法会启动异步发送操作中指定远程主机属性`e`参数。The method starts an asynchronous send operation to the remote host specified in the property of the `e` parameter. 调用方法使你能够发送单独的执行线程中的数据。Calling the method gives you the ability to send data within a separate execution thread. 尽管此方法适用于无连接协议，适用于无连接和面向连接的协议。Although this method is intended for connectionless protocols, works with both connectionless and connection-oriented protocols. 若要在完成时得到通知，必须创建实现的回调方法\ 委托和附加到回调事件。To be notified of completion, you must create a callback method that implements the EventHandler\ delegate and attach the callback to the event. 下列属性和事件上的对象所需成功调用此方法：The following properties and events on the object are required to successfully call this method: - - - - - 调用方可能设置到在调用前要求任何用户状态对象的属性方法，以便在回叫方法可检索信息。The caller may set the property to any user state object desired before calling the method, so that the information will be retrievable in the callback method. 如果回调需要比单个对象的详细信息，可以创建一个小型类来保存作为成员的其他所需的状态信息。If the callback needs more information than a single object, a small class can be created to hold the other required state information as members. 如果你使用的一个面向连接的协议，必须先调用， ， ， ， ，或方法。If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, you must first call the , , , , , or method. 否则为将引发。Otherwise will throw a . 当使用面向连接的协议，方法将忽略属性并将数据发送到中建立， ， ， ， 或方法。When using a connection-oriented protocol, the method will ignore the property and send data to the established in the , , , , , or method. 如果你使用的是无连接协议，不需要建立默认远程主机使用， ，或方法之前调用。If you are using a connectionless protocol, you do not need to establish a default remote host with the , , or method prior to calling . 只需执行此操作，如果你想要调用或方法。You only need to do this if you intend to call the or methods. 如果调用， ，或方法之前调用、属性只为发送操作将覆盖指定的默认远程主机。If you do call the , , or method prior to calling , the property will override the specified default remote host for that send operation only. 你还无需调用方法。You are also not required to call the method. 在这种情况下，基础服务提供程序将分配的最合适的本地网络 IP 地址和端口号。In this case, the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate local network IP address and port number. 如果你想要选择可用端口的基础服务提供程序，请使用端口号 0。Use a port number of zero if you want the underlying service provider to select a free port. 如果你需要确定分配的本地网络 IP 地址和端口号，则可以使用属性后的发出信号事件和调用关联的委托。If you need to identify the assigned local network IP address and port number, you can use the property after the event is signaled and the associated delegates are called. 如果你想要将数据发送到广播地址，则必须首先调用方法并设置套接字选项为 true。If you want to send data to a broadcast address, you must first call the method and set the socket option for to true. 你还必须是缓冲区的确保你的大小不超过基础服务提供程序的最大的数据包大小。You must also be sure that the size of your buffer does not exceed the maximum packet size of the underlying service provider. 如果是这样，将不发送数据报和将引发。If it does, the datagram will not be sent and will throw a . 如果指定中的 DontRoute 标志属性、 发送的无法路由的数据。If you specify the DontRoute flag in the property, the data you are sending will not be routed. 对于面向消息的套接字，必须格外小心不能超过基础传输的最大消息大小。For message-oriented sockets, care must be taken not to exceed the maximum message size of the underlying transport. 如果缓冲区的大小超过基础服务提供程序的最大的数据包大小，不会发送数据报和将引发。If the size of the buffer exceeds the maximum packet size of the underlying service provider, the datagram is not sent and will throw a . 成功完成方法并不表示已成功传递数据。The successful completion of a method does not indicate that the data was successfully delivered.

summary.span: Set the IP protection level on a socket.

span.span: Set the IP protection level on a socket.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使限制 IPv6 或 IP 套接字以侦听指定的作用域，如具有相同的地址的链接本地或站点本地前缀。The method enables restricting an a IPv6 or IP socket to listen on a specified scope, such as addresses with the same link local or site local prefix. 此套接字选项使应用程序可以限制对 IPv6 或 IP 套接字的访问。This socket option enables applications to place access restrictions on IPv6 or IP sockets. 通过应用此类限制，可让在专用局域网上运行的应用程序能够通过简单的方式很好地增强自身的安全性，以便防范外部攻击。Such restrictions enable an application running on a private LAN to simply and robustly harden itself against external attacks. 此套接字选项还可以用于删除访问权限限制，如果`level`参数设置为。This socket option can also be used to remove access restrictions if the `level` parameter is set to . 此套接字选项可以扩大或缩小侦听套接字的范围，从而使得公共用户和私人用户可以在适当情况下对站点进行无限制的访问，或者可以根据需要对同一站点进行有限制的访问。This socket option widens or narrows the scope of a listening socket, enabling unrestricted access from public and private users when appropriate, or restricting access only to the same site, as required. 此套接字选项具有 枚举中指定的已定义保护级别。This socket option has defined protection levels specified in the enumeration. 方法用于启用或禁用网络地址遍历 (NAT) 为实例。The method is used to enable or disable Network Address Traversal (NAT) for a instance. 可能使用 Teredo、 6to4 或 ISATAP 隧道提供 NAT 遍历。NAT traversal may be provided using Teredo, 6to4, or an ISATAP tunnel. 当`level`参数设置为，或，这会显式禁用 NAT 遍历实例。When the `level` parameter is set to , or , this explicitly disables NAT traversal for a instance. 当`level`参数设置为，这可能使 NAT 遍历具体取决于系统上实施防火墙规则。When the `level` parameter is set to , this may allow NAT traversal for a depending on firewall rules in place on the system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当使用面向连接的，始终调用方法在关闭前的。When using a connection-oriented , always call the method before closing the . 这可确保发送和关闭之前连接的套接字上接收到的所有数据。This ensures that all data is sent and received on the connected socket before it is closed. 调用方法释放所有托管和非托管资源与关联。Call the method to free all managed and unmanaged resources associated with the . 请不要尝试重用后结束。Do not attempt to reuse the after closing. 下表显示对有效的枚举值`how`参数。The following table shows the enumeration values that are valid for the `how` parameter. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |发送Send|禁用对此发送。Disable sending on this .| |接收Receive|禁用对此接收。Disable receiving on this .| |消息和传送Both|禁用同时发送和接收此。Disable both sending and receiving on this .| 设置`how`到指定，后续调用不允许。Setting `how` to specifies that subsequent calls to are not allowed. 如果你使用的是无连接，并指定将产生任何影响。If you are using a connectionless , specifying will have no effect. 设置`how`到指定，后续调用不允许。Setting `how` to specifies that subsequent calls to are not allowed. 这在较低的协议层上无效。This has no effect on lower protocol layers. 如果你使用的一个面向连接的协议，如果以下条件之一存在后调用，则连接将终止:If you are using a connection-oriented protocol, the connection is terminated if either of the following conditions exist after a call to : - 数据是等待接收传入的网络缓冲区中。Data is in the incoming network buffer waiting to be received. - 更多的数据已到达。More data has arrived. 如果你使用的是无连接协议，接受并排队数据报。If you are using a connectionless protocol, datagrams are accepted and queued. 但是，如果没有缓冲区空间可用于其他传入数据报，它们将被放弃，并且将向发件人返回任何错误。However, if no buffer space is available for additional incoming datagrams, they will be discarded and no error will be returned to the sender. 使用上是无连接不建议。Using on a connectionless is not recommended. 设置`how`到同时禁用发送和接收上文所述。Setting `how` to disables both sends and receives as described above. > [!NOTE] > 如果你收到调用时方法，请使用属性来获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a when calling the method, use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用禁用。The following code example uses to disable the . [!code-cpp[Classic Socket.Close Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Close Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Socket.Close Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Close Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Socket.Close Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Socket.Close Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the Time To Live (TTL) value of Internet Protocol (IP) packets sent by the .

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the Time To Live (TTL) value of Internet Protocol (IP) packets sent by the .

value.span: TTL 值。

span.span: The TTL value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks TTL 值指示的路由器数据包可以遍历路由器放弃数据包和 Internet 控制消息协议 (ICMP)"TTL 超出"之前的最大数目的错误消息返回到发件人。The TTL value indicates the maximum number of routers the packet can traverse before the router discards the packet and an Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) "TTL exceeded" error message is returned to the sender. 从 0 到 255，TTL 值可能设置为一个值。The TTL value may be set to a value from 0 to 255. 如果未设置此属性，套接字的默认 TTL 值为 32。When this property is not set, the default TTL value for a socket is 32. 传输控制协议 (TCP) 套接字上设置此属性被忽略由 TCP/IP 堆栈中，如果具有使用套接字已建立成功连接。Setting this property on a Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) socket is ignored by the TCP/IP stack if a successful connection has been established using the socket. 如果你收到，使用属性来获取特定的错误代码。If you receive a , use the property to obtain the specific error code. 获取此代码后，请参阅 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档 MSDN 库中的有关错误的详细说明。After you have obtained this code, refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library for a detailed description of the error. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-cpp[SocketPropertyTester#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SocketPropertyTester/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SocketPropertyTester#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SocketPropertyTester/CS/class1.cs#1)]
